channel.description: Boost Your Online Business With Kenta

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: kenta
item.content:encoded:
Designed to boost your
online business

Lorem ipsum is placeholder text commonly used in the graphic, print, and publishing industries for previewing layouts and visual mockups.

Get Started
Live Demo

Customizable

With our rich options, you can achieve almost any design and take complete control of your site.

More Details

Lightning Fast

 It's lightweight and loads fast. It minimizes the user’s waiting time as much as possible.

More Details

Gutenberg Builder

You can visually edit everything with the Gutenberg builder and our 10+ advanced block.

More Details

Starter Sites

Instead of building from scratch, build your website in one click from our pre-designed starting site.

More Details

Customizer

Customize everything without touching any code.

We have rich customization options for you to customize every detail of your site, including fonts, margins, colors, shadows and more. All this is done visually through the theme customizer without any coding skills.

Learn More

Speed

Lightweight and fast.

It's a very lightweight theme and loads fast. It is better than many similar themes and minimizes the user’s waiting time as much as possible.

Learn More

Gutenberg

Block based Page Builder.

You can visually edit everything with the Gutenberg page builder and our 10+ advanced block without touching any code.

Learn More

Starter Sites

Build your website with one click.

Instead of building from scratch, build your website in one click from our pre-designed starting site.

Learn More

Our Team

Meet Our Exclusive Team.

Cammie Davis

Director & CEO

Vinnie Griffith

Founder

Miller Warner

CO-Founder

Pricing

Simple Pricing, Unlimited Possibilities.

Awesome Feature

Awesome Feature

Sell unlimited Product

Core features

What makes us sparkle.

Live Site Editing

Edit your website in real-time with customizer. No more page refreshes.

Drag and Drop Builder

Building header and footer for your website by dragging and dropping elements is simple and flexible.

One-Click Importer

Instead of building your website from scratch, import pages, posts, widgets, theme options with just one click.

Responsive Design

Our themes are optimized for all devices using our responsive customize options.

Multi Archive Layouts

Grid layout, list layout and masonry layout. Sounds great doesn't it?

Pagination Types

Numbered, Prev & Next, Load More and Infinite scroll, we have everything.

1000+ Google Fonts

Powered by 1000+ Google fonts, fully customize the typography of your website.

Global Typography

Adjust the entire color palette and typography, making your site beautiful and unique.

FontAwesome Icons

Built-in FontAwesome v6 icons. Easily pick up and enrich your site.

Transparent Header

Easily set up transparent headers to create a big hero section for your website.

Page or Post Settings

You can individually set up sidebar, transparent header, container layouts, and more for each page or post.

Widgets Ready

We have multiple widget areas where you can add your desired widget.

OUR TESTIMONIAL

Don't just listen to us, see what our customers says

Evan Roy

Designer

item.title: Welcome to Kenta Theme
item.dc:creator: kenta
item.content:encoded:
Congrats! You made an awesome choice. We are glad you chose Kenta theme, if you are using our theme for the first time, You may be unfamiliar with it, but don't worry, just take 10 minutes, read our documentation first and then you will be happy to create amazing websites with it.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Kenta Blocks and why do I need it?

Kenta Blocks has a set of responsive advanced blocks with powerful options and pre-designed templates library. It takes full advantage of the WordPress editor’s features. With the simple and easy-to-use interface, you can visually design any post and page, whether you are a beginner or a professional designer.

So whether you want to create a beautiful landing page, introduction page or personal homepage, it can help you achieve and provide the best editing experience.

Learn more here: https://kentatheme.com/docs/kenta-blocks/

what is Kenta Companion and why do I need it?

The Companion Plugin brings some extra features like cookie consent, socials and more. Additionally, you can access our Kenta theme starter sites library where you can import our pre-designed starting site with one click.

Lean more here: https://kentatheme.com/docs/kenta-theme/general/importing-starter-sites/

Still Have Questions?

If you encounter a problem that is not covered in the documentation or find a bug in the theme, feel free to create a new ticket in the theme support forum, we always monitor the forum and reply to your question as soon as possible.

Create a new tick here: https://wordpress.org/support/theme/kenta/
